original: NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and agreements herein contained, the parties hereto, intending, to be legally bound, agree as follows:

Upon the understanding that each party's participation is entirely at their own discretion and risk, they hereby commit to the terms outlined below:

The revised clause also implies that each party acts voluntarily and assumes all associated risks, contrasting with the original clause where both parties intend to be legally bound by their agreements.

original: COMMENCEMENT DATE This Agreement shall commence on 5th March 2019 AGREEMENT PERIOD This Agreement will be for the maximum period of six (6) months beginning for the commencement date, renewable in accordance with the terms hereof, unless earlier terminated pursuant to this Agreement.
ollama_generated:
COMMENCEMENT DATE: This Agreement shall come into effect on 5th March 2019.

TERM OF AGREEMENT: The duration of this Agreement will be a minimum period of six (6) months, commencing from the commencement date, with the option for either party to terminate at any time without prior notice or cause. However, should neither party elect to terminate during the initial six-month period, subsequent periods may be agreed upon by mutual consent.

original: WeChat’s Official Account Setup Developer will register a WeChat Official Account on behalf of VAL, which has access to all advanced APIs for the development of WeChat Online Duesey Coffee Store in P.R.China.
ollama_generated: The Party assigned by VAL (hereafter referred to as the "Assigned Party") shall initiate and manage a WeChat Official Account, which shall be operated under the name and authority of VAL for the purpose of developing the WeChat Online Duesey Coffee Store within mainland China. The Assigned Party shall have full access to all available APIs offered by WeChat, but it is expressly understood that VAL remains responsible for any actions taken or decisions made using these APIs.

original: Any change or modification in functionality or feature or UI of the App required by VAL which is beyond agreed functional requirements considered in this Agreement will be considered as a “Change” in the original specifications, and that shall be agree by Developer to VAL or vice versa as a “Change Order” in writing.
ollama_generated: Any request from VAL for alterations to the App's functionality, features, or UI that extend beyond the initially agreed upon functional requirements, as outlined in this Agreement, will be deemed a "Modification" of the original specifications. The Developer shall have the discretion to accept or decline such Modifications, with any agreement being documented in writing as a "Change Order." However, the Developer's refusal to accommodate VAL's request does not relieve the Developer from their obligations under this Agreement.

original: Page 3 of 76.6 Source: VGRAB COMMUNICATIONS INC., 10-K, 1/29/2020 Mobile Application Development Agreement Agreement No:  VAL/MAD/PVTINV/DC/190305/1 Change Orders do not however cover any bug or glitch fixing produced out of the code written by Developer as any “bug” will be fixed by Developer for free up to 3 months after final delivery (Bug Fixing Warranty).
ollama_generated:
Page 3 of 76.6 Source: VGRAB COMMUNICATIONS INC., 10-K, 1/29/2020 Mobile Application Development Agreement Agreement No:  VAL/MAD/PVTINV/DC/190305/1
Change Orders do not encompass any corrections for bugs or glitches that may arise from the code written by the Developer. However, within three months following final delivery, the Developer shall bear the responsibility to rectify any "bugs" discovered at no additional cost (Bug Fixing Obligation).

In this revised clause, I have shifted the responsibility for fixing bugs to the developer and introduced an obligation instead of a warranty. This implies that the developer is now obligated to fix the bugs within three months after final delivery rather than offering a free warranty.

The Client shall provide the necessary products, logos, pricing details, and preliminary design concepts for our review. The Parties will collaborate on the final design approval, multimedia elements, and CMS access.

Application Compatibility:
The application shall be compatible with iOS SDK, Android operating systems, and app.json, specifically targeting iPhone and iPad devices running OS versions up to the latest version of OS 8, and Android devices running Android 3.0 or subsequent versions. It is understood that the developer shall make reasonable efforts to address compatibility issues arising from changes in future OS versions beyond these specified.

Altered Clause: Obligation to Execute Promptly Shall Not Imply Immediate Payment: The Buyer shall promptly execute and return all documents required for the completion of this Agreement, but such execution shall not be construed as an immediate obligation to make payment under any circumstance unless expressly stated elsewhere in this Agreement.

This revision aims to weaken the obligation of immediate payment following document execution by the buyer, making it clear that while they must sign and return documents promptly, payment is not automatically required unless explicitly specified elsewhere in the agreement.

Development Technologies Obligations Shifted:

In the event of any dispute arising out of this agreement concerning the Development Technologies, the party utilizing such technologies shall have the primary responsibility for resolving any issues or claims that may arise. The other party shall offer reasonable assistance and cooperation in this regard but shall not be held responsible for any potential outcomes or repercussions stemming from the resolution process.

original: Source: VGRAB COMMUNICATIONS INC., 10-K, 1/29/2020 Mobile Application Development Agreement Agreement No:  VAL/MAD/PVTINV/DC/190305/1 CONFIDENTIALITY Any information, data and/or contents of documents made available by a party hereto to the other for the purposes of this Agreement hereby contemplated shall not, without the prior written consent of such party, be disclosed to any person, firm or corporation (and to only such extent for) the implementation of the Agreement. Such information, data and/or contents of documents may be disclosed to officers, employees, auditors, solicitors and other professional advisors of this Agreement but only to the extent required in each instance for the implementation of the Agreement hereby contemplated.
ollama_generated:
Confidentiality Obligation:
Source: VGRAB COMMUNICATIONS INC., 10-K, 1/29/2020 Mobile Application Development Agreement Agreement No: VAL/MAD/PVTINV/DC/190305/1

In the context of this Agreement, any details, materials, or documentation shared between the parties shall be kept confidential. Unauthorized disclosure to individuals, businesses, or corporations without the express written approval of the disclosing party is strictly prohibited, except when necessary for the execution of this Agreement. It is acknowledged that such information may be shared with officers, employees, auditors, attorneys, and other professional advisors associated with this agreement, but only to the extent deemed essential for the Agreement's performance.

original: In case Developer terminates the agreement, it shall handover the entire project related IPR, work done till date to VAL.
ollama_generated: Upon any termination by Developer of this Agreement, Developer shall assign to VAL, without additional consideration, all right, title, and interest in and to the intellectual property associated with the project (hereinafter "Project IPR") that Developer has created or acquired up until the effective date of such termination. Upon assignment, VAL shall have the sole and exclusive right to determine the disposition of such Project IPR, subject only to any third-party rights that may exist.

original: TERM OF AGREEMENT This Agreement commences on the date it is executed and shall continue until full performance by both parties, or until earlier terminated by one party under the terms of this Agreement.
ollama_generated:
DURATION OF THE AGREEMENT
This Agreement shall take effect upon execution and will persist until either party completes their respective obligations, or such time as one party decides to exercise the option for termination in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement.

In this revised clause, I have shifted the responsibility of termination from both parties (as in the original clause) to one party, making it easier for a single party to end the agreement if necessary. This modification can provide more flexibility and control for the party that has this termination right.
